short_summary: As part of the National Accommodation Program, ESDC Real Property in Atlantic is expanding the file/mail room within the office at 689 Topsail Rd. St. John\u2019s NL. We are seeking to deliver the best solution to maximize space in order to accommodate storage of files and boxes adhering to safety and accessibility. ESDC is seeking a mechanical assist high density file system (can be a combination of mobile and fixed) solution that is up to an estimated 8,000 linear ft of desired storage.
description: The {department} department has a requirement for high density mobile shelving system and Tender closing date is: 2023-06-16T12:00:00 NST
full_summary:
## Notice of Proposed Procurement

### Title:
High Density Mobile Shelving in St. John’s, NL

### Reference Information:
- **Reference Number**: CB-6075-65058298
- **Amendment Number**: 2
- **Solicitation Number**: 100023782

### Tender Details:
- **Publication Date**: June 01, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date**: June 16, 2023 (12:00 PM NST)
- **Tender Status**: Cancelled

### Business and Technical Details:
- **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (G&D)
- **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive – Traditional
- **Trade Agreements**: Various international agreements (refer to the attachment for a comprehensive list)

### Technical Description:
As part of the National Accommodation Program, we are seeking to expand the file/mail room within the office at 689 Topsail Rd, St. John’s, NL. We are looking for a high-density file storage solution that meets the following requirements:
- **Storage Space**: Approximately 8,000 linear ft of storage
- **Support**: Mechanical assistance is preferred (e.g., mobile and fixed systems)
- **Accessibility and Safety**: Must adhere to standards

### Additional Information:
- **Solicited by**: Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC)
- **Contact Information**: Mykola Polataiko, mykola.polataiko@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca, (343) 598-7872

### Closing Note:
This Notice of Proposed Procurement is the only public notice. All interested suppliers should be registered under the solicitation number 100023782. Solicitation documentation will be sent directly to qualified vendors with a valid Supply Arrangement E60HN-21HDMS. All inquiries and requests for documentation should be directed to the contact listed above. Support Arrangement E was cancelled, therefore eligible suppliers are part of this Arrangement. This notice replaces 2605773-T2. Answer ID: 65621696.
